languages.text: Разновидность {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}неснижаемого урона{/g}, игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}. Наносит все, что повреждает нервную систему органических целей. Неорганические цели, такие как машины и физические {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытия{/g}, невосприимчивы к этому типу {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

A type of {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}irreducible damage{/g}. Ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. Dealt by anything that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} the nervous system of organic targets. Non-organic targets like machines and physical {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} are immune to it.

languages.text: Eine Art von {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}unreduzierbarem Schaden{/g}. Ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}. Wird von allem verursacht, was das Nervensystem organischer Ziele {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}schädigt{/g}. Nicht-organische Ziele wie Maschinen und physische {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} sind dagegen immun.
languages.original_text: A type of {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}irreducible damage{/g}. Ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. Dealt by anything that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} the nervous system of organic targets. Non-organic targets like machines and physical {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} are immune to it.

traits.locale_text: Eine Art von {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}unreduzierbarem Schaden{/g}. Ignoriert {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}. Wird von allem verursacht, das das Nervensystem von organischen Zielen schädigt. Nicht-organische Ziele wie Maschinen und physische {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} sind dagegen immun.

languages.text: Type de {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}dégâts non réductibles{/g}. Ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}. Infligés par tout ce qui {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}endommage{/g} le système nerveux des cibles organiques. Les cibles non organiques, comme les machines et les {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couvertures{/g} physiques y sont insensibles.
languages.original_text: A type of {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}irreducible damage{/g}. Ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. Dealt by anything that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} the nervous system of organic targets. Non-organic targets like machines and physical {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} are immune to it.

traits.locale_text: Type de {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}dégâts non réductibles{/g}. Ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g}. Infligés par tout ce qui endommage le système nerveux des cibles organiques. Les cibles non organiques, comme les machines et les {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couvertures{/g} physiques sont invulnérables à ceux-ci.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}透射伤害{/g}的其中一种。透射伤害无视目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。针对有机目标神经系统的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。非有机目标（如机械）与物理{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}对此类伤害免疫。

languages.original_text: A type of {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}irreducible damage{/g}. Ignores Armour. Dealt by anything that damages the nervous system of organic targets. Non-organic targets like machines and physical cover are immune to it.

languages.text: Un tipo de {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}daño irreducible{/g}. Ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}. Lo inflige todo lo que {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dañe{/g} el sistema nervioso de los objetivos orgánicos. Los objetivos no orgánicos, como las máquinas y la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} física, son inmunes.
languages.original_text: A type of {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}irreducible damage{/g}. Ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. Dealt by anything that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} the nervous system of organic targets. Non-organic targets like machines and physical {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} are immune to it.

traits.locale_text: Un tipo de {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}daño irreducible{/g}. Ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g}. Lo inflige todo lo que dañe el sistema nervioso de los objetivos orgánicos. Los objetivos no orgánicos, como las máquinas y la {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} física, son inmunes.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}既約のダメージ{/g}の一種{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を無視する。有機性ターゲットの神経系へ{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を加えるものによって与えられる。機械や物理的な{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}のような非有機性ターゲットには無効である。
languages.original_text: A type of {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}irreducible damage{/g}. Ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. Dealt by anything that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} the nervous system of organic targets. Non-organic targets like machines and physical {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} are immune to it.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}既約のダメージ{/g}の一種{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}を無視する。有機性ターゲットの神経系へダメージを与えるものによる攻撃。機械や物理的な{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}のような非有機性ターゲットには無効である。

languages.text: Bir {g|Encyclopedia:IrreducibleDamage}azaltılamaz hasar{/g} türü. Hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhını{/g} yok sayar. Organik hedeflerin sinir sistemine zarar veren her şey bu {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} sebep olur. Makineler gibi inorganik hedefler ve fiziksel {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperler{/g} bu hasar türüne karşı bağışıktır.

Dealt by anything that {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} the nervous system of organic targets. Non-organic targets like machines and physical {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} are immune to it.
